overview: Oxygen will attempt to tell the story of Tupac Shakur’s murder in a new two-hour documentary called Snapped: Notorious Tupac Shakur. In a doc set to air Sept. 10, just three days after the anniversary of the shooting that claimed ’Pac’s life, Oxygen dives deep into ’Pac’s final hours to try and solve the decades-old mystery.
title: Snapped Notorious: Tupac Shakur
